name: Pokémon™ Dream Radar
description: Pokémon Dream Radar is a motion-controlled shooting game that allows you to use Augmented Reality technology to chase down Pokémon that appear in the Interdream Zone! The game uses some of the coolest features of the Nintendo 3DS system, including the 3D camera and gyro sensor. You can catch hard-to-get Pokémon in Pokémon Dream Radar. Including the Legendary trio Tornadus, Thundurus, and Landorus, which show up in all-new Formes in the game. The appearance of these three Pokémon in Therian Forme is very different from their traditional Incarnate Forme. When using your Nintendo 3DS system, you can also send the Pokémon you catch to your copy of the Pokémon Black Version 2 or Pokémon White Version 2 game for the Nintendo DS™ system, giving you even more ways to fill up your Pokédex!
